name: Vital Signs BodyWeight
title: VitalSigns BodyWeight
description: FHIR Body Weight Profile - Copied FHIR Vital Sign Profile to remove .component.value quantity type constrain. More information can be found in GForge ticket #13796 or in the FHIR zulip chat https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/implementers/subject/Vital.20signs.20supporting.20observations.

element.definition: This profile defines  how to represent body weight observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure.

element.comment: additional codes that translate or map to this code are allowed.  For example a more granular LOINC code or code that is used locally in a system.

binding.description: Common UCUM units for Body Weight
